channel.title: cocoapods on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in cocoapods on Fresh Swift

item.title: CocoaPods 1.5.0 â€” Swift Static Libraries
item.description: Coming just a few months after the release of Cocoapods 1.4, this latest release of the popular dependency manager adds support for building Swift pods as static libraries. This is something that will please a lot a developers, especially those building command line tools.
